pr_title: Allow INSERT null for SQL Server varbinary type

timeline.bodyText:
Can this be tested with DataTypeTest? Maybe we can have TestSqlServerTypeMapping stub?
(see #565)
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: @findepi I avoided TestSqlServerTypeMapping considering #4734, but moved the test to the class. Confirmed TestSqlServerTypeMapping.testVarbinary failed before this commit.
replies.author: ebyhr

replies.bodyText: Right. Let's have a TODO in the code, to move the method over there, while TestSqlServerTypeMapping exists
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: Oh, i see you called the test class TestSqlServerTypeMappi. Fine.
replies.author: findepi

timeline.author: findepi

timeline.bodyText: nit: no need for a newline
timeline.author: findepi

timeline.bodyText:
This test seems to be passing even without changes in SqlServerClient.
Intentional?
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: @findepi Sorry, it's unintentional. I should have separated INSERT statements.
replies.author: ebyhr
